champ_0250_system_01: Are you ready to face Hassel of the Elite Four?
champ_0250_dragon_01:
I was, of course, absolutely certain you would
make it to me eventually.[VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_dragon_02:
Young sprouts truly do grow with astounding
speed, yes...[VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_dragon_03:
But I never for a moment imagined we would be
facing each other so soon![VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_dragon_04:
Now, a teacher’s duty is to guide students and
aid their growth.[VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_dragon_05:
But I think I shall forget about my role as a
teacher for a moment...[VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_dragon_06:
and wield all my might for the sole purpose of
defeating you![VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_dragon_07:
I am Hassel, the dragon guarding the final
fortress of the Elite Test.[VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_dragon_17:
Prepare to learn firsthand how the fiery breath
of ferocious battle feels![VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_dragon_09: I’b...I’b just so proud ob you...[VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_steel_02:
Awww, don’t cry, Grandpa Hassel! There, there—
wanna hug?[VAR 0114(0014)]
champ_0250_ground_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Sorry ’bout all this, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].
The\r
old\r
man\r
can\r
get\r
like\r
that\r
sometimes.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0250_dragon_11: So whad ib I do?! I’b jusd—jusd so oberwhelmed![VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_ground_03:
Guess I’ve got to do the talking...\c
Anyway, your result for the Elite Test of the
Champion Assessment is...[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0250_ground_04: a pass! No doubt about it![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0250_ground_06:
I’d say you’re good to go, but...there’s actually
just a wee bit more to the Champion Assessment.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0250_ground_09:
Our fearless commander—the final opponent
you’ll face for your test—is waiting beyond it.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0250_ground_10:
Her skills are so amazing, she was able to
strong-arm all of us into joining the Elite Four.\c
You won’t find a mightier Champion.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0250_ground_11:
Though I think you’ll do fine, kiddo! You beat
me, after all![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0250_ground_14:
I’ll patch up your team—on the house—so don’t
lose, you hear?[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0250_steel_04a: I really love your Pokémon, miss![VAR 0114(0014)]
champ_0250_steel_04b: I really love your Pokémon, mister![VAR 0114(0014)]
champ_0250_steel_05: So I’ll cheer for you as hard as I can![VAR 0114(0014)]
champ_0250_dragon_13: Even a baby dragon can breathe fire![VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_ground_12: Whoa! Guess you got over your sobs, huh?[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0250_dragon_14: You can do this. We all know you can.[VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_dragon_15:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Now go, young [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
Your\r
hands\r
may\r
be\r
small,\r
but\r
let\r
them\r
seize\r
a\r
great victory![VAR 0114(0012)]
champ_0250_ground_13:
[VAR BD06(0000)]All right, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]...
Show\r
us\r
the\r
fight\r
of\r
the century![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0250_steel_06: Good luck on your final test![VAR 0114(0014)]
champ_0250_dragon_16:
Your final opponent is terribly strong...but then,
so are you!\c
Banish your fear! With a calm mind, you will
surely see the path to triumph![VAR 0114(0012)]
